intro.title: Convert PDFs into text without the fuss
intro.description: Upload your PDF and extract text in seconds. Nothing is sent to remote servers: everything happens directly in your browser.

dropzone.title: Drop your PDF here
dropzone.subtitle: Or click to pick it from your device

status.noText: No text could be extracted from the document.
status.error: We couldn't read the PDF. Make sure it isn't protected and try again later.

fallback.title: No PDF selected
fallback.description: Upload a document to get started. If the tool becomes unavailable, the top bar button will automatically hide to avoid confusion.

errors.copy: Unable to copy text to the clipboard
